name: windows-2-mac
description: I'm working on a Mac with a swiss german keyboard if you have another keyboard, some of the shortcuts might be different. ![external keyboard layout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gwildu/windows-2-mac/master/assets/keyboard_external.jpg "external keyboard layout") ![internal keyboard layout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gwildu/windows-2-mac/master/assets/keyboard_internal.jpg "internal keyboard layout")

scripts.build: markdown README.md -s styles.css > docs/index.html && node-sass styles/main.scss docs/styles.css

author: @gwildu
